sqlMap.select: SELECT ITEM_ID as itemId, CORRECT_ANSWER as correctAnswer, ITEM_TYPE as itemType, DESCRIPTION as description, NAME as name, EXT_STIMULUS_ID as extStimulusId, EXT_STIMULUS_TITLE as extStimulusTitle, CREATED_DATE_TIME as createdDateTime, CREATED_BY as createdBy, UPDATED_BY as updatedBy, UPDATED_DATE_TIME as updatedDateTime, ACTIVATION_STATUS as activationStatus, VERSION as version, ITEM_DISPLAY_NAME as itemDisplayName, TEMPLATE_ID as templateId, THINK_CODE as thinkCode, ONLINE_CR as onlineCr FROM ITEM WHERE ITEM_ID = #itemId:VARCHAR#

SELECT distinct I.ITEM_ID as itemId, ISI.ITEM_SET_ID as itemSetId, CORRECT_ANSWER as correctAnswer, ITEM_TYPE as itemType, DESCRIPTION as description, NAME as name, EXT_STIMULUS_ID as extStimulusId, EXT_STIMULUS_TITLE as extStimulusTitle, I.CREATED_DATE_TIME as createdDateTime, I.CREATED_BY as createdBy, I.UPDATED_BY as updatedBy, I.UPDATED_DATE_TIME as updatedDateTime, I.ACTIVATION_STATUS as activationStatus, I.VERSION as version, ITEM_DISPLAY_NAME as itemDisplayName, TEMPLATE_ID as templateId, THINK_CODE as thinkCode, ONLINE_CR as onlineCr, MIN_POINTS as minPoints, MAX_POINTS as maxPoints, ISI.ITEM_SORT_ORDER as itemSortOrder FROM ITEM I, ITEM_SET_ITEM ISI, DATAPOINT DP, ITEM_SET ISET WHERE I.ITEM_ID = ISI.ITEM_ID AND DP.ITEM_ID (+) = I.ITEM_ID AND ISI.ITEM_SET_ID = #itemSetId:NUMERIC# AND ISI.SUPPRESSED = 'F' AND I.ITEM_TYPE != 'RQ' AND ISET.ITEM_SET_ID = ISI.ITEM_SET_ID AND ISET.SAMPLE = 'F'

SELECT ISI.ITEM_ID as itemId, DCC.CONDITION_CODE_ID as conditionCodeId FROM ITEM_SET_ITEM ISI, DATAPOINT D, DATAPOINT_CONDITION_CODE DCC, ITEM WHERE ISI.ITEM_ID = D.ITEM_ID AND D.DATAPOINT_ID = DCC.DATAPOINT_ID AND ISI.ITEM_SET_ID = #itemSetId:NUMERIC# AND ISI.ITEM_ID = ITEM.ITEM_ID AND ISI.SUPPRESSED = 'F' AND ITEM.ITEM_TYPE != 'RQ'

SELECT REPORTING_ISET.ITEM_SET_NAME as contentAreaName, SUBTEST_ISI.ITEM_ID as itemId, SUBTEST_ISET.ITEM_SET_ID as itemSetId, REPORTING_ISET.ITEM_SET_ID as contentAreaId, PROD.PRODUCT_ID as productId, DP.MAX_POINTS as maxPoints FROM ITEM_SET REPORTING_ISET, ITEM_SET SUBTEST_ISET, ITEM_SET_ITEM SUBTEST_ISI, ITEM_SET_ITEM OBJECTIVE_ISI, ITEM_SET_ANCESTOR ISA, ITEM_SET_CATEGORY ISC, PRODUCT PROD, DATAPOINT DP, ITEM WHERE PROD.PRODUCT_ID = #productId:NUMERIC# AND SUBTEST_ISET.ITEM_SET_ID = #itemSetId:NUMERIC# AND SUBTEST_ISET.ITEM_SET_TYPE = 'TD' AND SUBTEST_ISI.ITEM_SET_ID = SUBTEST_ISET.ITEM_SET_ID AND ISC.FRAMEWORK_PRODUCT_ID = PROD.PARENT_PRODUCT_ID AND ISC.ITEM_SET_CATEGORY_LEVEL = PROD.CONTENT_AREA_LEVEL AND OBJECTIVE_ISI.ITEM_ID = SUBTEST_ISI.ITEM_ID AND ISA.ITEM_SET_ID = OBJECTIVE_ISI.ITEM_SET_ID AND REPORTING_ISET.ITEM_SET_ID = ISA.ANCESTOR_ITEM_SET_ID AND REPORTING_ISET.ITEM_SET_CATEGORY_ID = ISC.ITEM_SET_CATEGORY_ID AND REPORTING_ISET.ITEM_SET_TYPE = 'RE' AND DP.ITEM_ID = SUBTEST_ISI.ITEM_ID AND DP.ITEM_SET_ID = OBJECTIVE_ISI.ITEM_SET_ID AND SUBTEST_ISI.ITEM_ID = ITEM.ITEM_ID AND SUBTEST_ISI.SUPPRESSED = 'F' AND ITEM.ITEM_TYPE != 'RQ' AND (SUBTEST_ISET.item_set_level != 'L' OR PROD.PRODUCT_TYPE = 'TL') ORDER BY CONTENTAREANAME

SELECT ISETCA.ITEM_SET_NAME AS CONTENTAREA, ITEM.ITEM_ID AS ITEMID, ITEM.EXTERNAL_ID AS PEID FROM ITEM_SET ISET, ITEM, ITEM_SET_ITEM ISI, ITEM_SET_ITEM ISICA, ITEM_SET_ANCESTOR ISA, ITEM_SET ISETCA, ITEM_SET_CATEGORY ISC WHERE ISET.ITEM_SET_ID = #itemSetId:NUMERIC# AND ISET.ITEM_SET_ID = ISI.ITEM_SET_ID AND ISI.ITEM_ID = ITEM.ITEM_ID AND ITEM.EXTERNAL_ID IS NOT NULL AND ISICA.ITEM_ID = ITEM.ITEM_ID AND ISA.ITEM_SET_ID = ISICA.ITEM_SET_ID AND ISETCA.ITEM_SET_ID = ISA.ANCESTOR_ITEM_SET_ID AND ISETCA.ITEM_SET_TYPE = 'RE' AND ISC.ITEM_SET_CATEGORY_ID = ISETCA.ITEM_SET_CATEGORY_ID AND ISC.FRAMEWORK_PRODUCT_ID IN (3700, 3500) AND ISC.ITEM_SET_CATEGORY_NAME = 'Content Area' ORDER BY ISI.ITEM_SORT_ORDER

SELECT ISET.ITEM_SET_ID AS contentAreaId, ISET.ITEM_SET_NAME AS contentAreaName, ISETTD.ITEM_SET_ID AS itemSetId FROM PRODUCT PROD, ITEM_SET_CATEGORY ISC, ITEM_SET ISET, ITEM_SET ISETTD WHERE PROD.PRODUCT_ID = #productId:NUMERIC# AND PROD.PARENT_PRODUCT_ID = ISC.FRAMEWORK_PRODUCT_ID AND ISC.ITEM_SET_CATEGORY_LEVEL = PROD.CONTENT_AREA_LEVEL AND ISET.ITEM_SET_CATEGORY_ID = ISC.ITEM_SET_CATEGORY_ID AND ISETTD.ITEM_SET_ID = #itemSetId:NUMERIC# AND SUBSTR(DECODE(ISETTD.ITEM_SET_LEVEL, 'K', 'K-1', DECODE(ISETTD.ITEM_SET_LEVEL, '1', 'K-1', ISETTD.ITEM_SET_LEVEL)), 3, 3) = ISET.ITEM_SET_LEVEL ORDER BY ISET.ITEM_SET_NAME
